tool_description: Identifies and classifies military assets, infrastructure, and facilities in satellite imagery using AI-powered recognition algorithms.

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence for object detection (0.1 to 1.0)

max_objects.description: Maximum number of objects to detect

overlap_threshold.description: IoU threshold for duplicate suppression (0.1 to 0.9)
